EmailTemplate.name: 2015 Feb Grad Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: NCS - Let us know what you think. It's worth something.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Let us know what you think
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
NCS want to know what you care about and what you think should happen after NCS. Take a minute to click this link, answer a few questions and you could win up to £50 worth of Love2Shop high street shopping vouchers.
http://csr.dubinterviewer.com/scripts/dubinterviewer.dll/Frames?Quest=1006&Source=1
Thank you for your feedback.
The Challenge
